title: Worldwide Threats and Homeland Security Challenges (FBI - Federal Bureau of Investigation)
text: ( Source : FBI - Federal Bureau of Investigation ) Good afternoon Chairman McCaul, Ranking Member Thompson , and members of the committee. Thank you for the opportunity to appear before you today to discuss the current threats to the homeland
